explains: n. 小地毯，垫子；<英> （盖腿的）厚毯子，毛毯；<美，非正式>（男子的）遮秃假发；（马的）披毯，裹毯
wordGroup: persian rug 波斯地毯；波斯毛毯

sentences.en: The corners of the rug were curling up.
The rug adds a dash of colour to the room.
sentences.cn: 小地毯为房间增添了一点色彩。

sentences.en: A spark from the fire had set light to a rug.
sentences.cn: 从火炉迸出的火星点燃了地毯。
